channel.title: Creating custom / modified item sprites, need some help
channel.description: I just started running a runescape classic server and am looking to change some of the weapon sprites and perhaps create a few new ones of my own. I have managed to patch my own custom login screen into my sprites.rscd file, however when I get lost when it comes to editing the sprites for the weapons. Can someone give me a link to a tutorial for this? I am able to change all the sprites in the rscd files fine, however i am looking for what file defines what sprite goes to what weapon (example - bronze dagger = sprite 0)

item.title: Creating custom / modified item sprites, need some help
item.dc:creator: @f_2_p_2_p_f f 2 p 2 p f
item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

You might be better off figuring out more about rsc servers and how they work before attempting to
Make new items and putting them into it.

Other than changing colors on pre-existing items making custom sprites other than very basic ones
Is fairly difficult.

Read full topic
item.source: Creating custom / modified item sprites, need some help
